description_html:
Brainstorm on-the-go with our new mobile glass offering, Stroll. Our latest addition is designed to brighten your
space with 13 glass color options and 6 optional fabric panels. The powder-coated aluminum frame is sturdy,
lightweight, and the addition of heavy-duty casters give Stroll the flexibility to move from carpet to tile with little
effort. A recessed pocket acts as a handle that also ensures your markers and eraser are accessible. Use the
glass mobile alone, or line up multiple units to divide an open office, making it easy to collaborate in motion.
